txRejected.tx_rejected_info_2: 您的交易将不会被包含在区块链中.您的资金完全可用，可以发送.

publicNoncesRejected.public_nonces_rejected_info: 公共随机数被SSP密钥拒绝.
publicNoncesRejected.public_nonces_rejected_info_2: SSP密钥拒绝发送公共随机数.没有公共随机数，SSP钱包无法在EVM链上构建交易.

publicNoncesReceived.public_nonces_received_info: 公共随机数已成功接收并存储.公共随机数用于在EVM链上构建交易.

transactionsTable.tx_unconfirmed: 未确认.交易尚未被挖矿.
transactionsTable.tx_pending: 待处理.交易正在等待SSP密钥授权.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_info: 增加费用，替换或取消交易.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_desc: 通过费用替换(RBF)允许您用提供更高费用的另一个交易替换未确认的交易.如果您的交易在较长时间内仍未确认，您可以考虑使用RBF功能来提高交易费用.此外，还可以修改接收方、金额或付款备注.通过将资金发送到您的一个地址，您还可以取消交易.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_desc_b: RBF在任何情况下都需要更高的交易费用.替换并非保证成功，区块生产者和矿工可能仍会偏好之前的交易.只有未确认的交易可以被替换.
transactionsTable.err_export: 导出交易时出错.请重试.

nodesTable.name: 名称
nodesTable.start_node_info: 此操作将向区块链广播启动交易，尝试启动您的{{chainName}}节点.
nodesTable.start_node_info_2: 请确保您的{{chainName}}节点正在运行并通过基准测试，然后再启动节点以避免DoS状态.
nodesTable.delete_node_info: 此操作将使您的{{chainName}}节点锁定的抵押可用作花费.
nodesTable.delete_node_info_2: 如果您的节点抵押未被花费，您的{{chainName}}节点将继续运行并可以重新设置.
nodesTable.open_fluxos_info: 此操作将在您的浏览器中打开FluxOS，同时最小化SSP钱包.
nodesTable.err_start: 启动{{chainName}}节点时出错.请确保您的抵押已获得100次确认，并且节点状态为离线，然后再试一次.
nodesTable.err_unable_identity: 无法生成节点身份.请稍后再试.
nodesTable.err_delete: 删除{{chainName}}节点时出错.请重试.
nodesTable.add_to_flux_storage_info: 此操作将上传您配置的Flux节点到Flux存储.这将简化您的FluxOS设置.系统将提供用于FluxOS设置的存储标识符.
nodesTable.err_upload_storage: 将{{chainName}}节点上传到Flux存储时出错.请重试.
nodesTable.add_to_storage_added: 您的Flux节点已存储在Flux存储中，现在可以在FluxOS设置中使用.
nodesTable.add_to_storage_added_info: 复制Flux存储短语并在您的FluxOS设置中使用.

setupNode.err_saving_node: 保存节点时出错.请重试.

sspWalletDetails.err_invalid_wallet_seed_2: 无效的钱包种子，无法解密.
sspWalletDetails.err_invalid_wallet_xpub_2_id: 无效的身份钱包xpub，无法解密.
sspWalletDetails.err_s1: 错误代码S1：解密密码时出现问题
sspWalletDetails.ssp_mnemonic_desc: 种子短语是您钱包中最重要的部分。它用于派生所有扩展的私钥和公钥。请将其写下来并妥善保管。如果您丢失种子短语，将无法访问您的资金。切勿与任何人共享，因为这将赋予其对SSP钱包部分的完全控制权。
sspWalletDetails.ssp_sync_wallet_key_desc: 此二维码用于将您的SSP钱包与您的SSP密钥同步。使用SSP密钥扫描此二维码以同步您的SSP钱包和SSP密钥。它还会自动同步比特币链。
sspWalletDetails.chain_sync_ssp_key_desc: 此二维码用于将您的{{chain}} SSP钱包与您的SSP密钥同步。使用SSP密钥扫描此二维码以同步您的{{chain}}链。
sspWalletDetails.chain_extended_pub_desc: 扩展公钥用于派生所有{{chain}}公钥，从这些公钥构建地址。这是公开部分，可以安全共享，不会授予对资金的访问权限。这是SSP钱包与您的SSP密钥同步以生成地址的内容。
sspWalletDetails.chain_extended_priv_desc: 扩展私钥用于派生控制您的公钥（地址）的所有{{chain}}私钥。这是私密部分，请勿共享，因为这将授予对资金的访问权限。

addressDetails.wallet_redeem_script_desc: 赎回脚本代码描述了花费钱包资金必须满足的条件。您通常不需要此代码，但最好将其保存在某处以备需要。它是安全的共享，不会授予对您资金的控制权，但会暴露公钥。
addressDetails.wallet_witness_script_desc: 见证脚本代码描述了花费钱包资金必须满足的条件.您通常不需要此代码，但最好将其保存在某处以备需要.它是安全的共享，不会授予对您资金的控制权，但会暴露公钥.
addressDetails.wallet_priv_key_desc: 私钥授予对您特定钱包地址的控制权.这是私密部分，请勿共享，因为这将授予对资金的访问权限.

settings.err_saving_conf: 保存配置时出错。请再试一次.
settings.public_nonces_sync_help: Public nonces are required for EVM transactions. This forces synchronisation of nonces from your SSP Key device to enable EVM transaction signing.

receive.wallet_address_desc: 这是您的钱包地址.您可以将此地址与任何人共享以接收资金.
receive.warning_chain_only: This address is for the {{chain_name}} ({{chain_symbol}}) blockchain only. Only deposit assets on the {{chain_name}} ({{chain_symbol}}) chain to this address. Depositing from another chain will result in a loss of funds!
receive.address_info_block: Use this address only for the {{chain_name}} ({{chain_symbol}}) network. Each blockchain has its own unique address for security purposes. For cross-network transfers, please use bridge services.
receive.bridge_for_cross_chain: For cross-network transfers, use bridge services

confirmTxKey.info_1: To confirm the transaction on your SSP Key, open your SSP Key on your mobile phone and confirm the action. You can tap to refresh or scan the following QR code.
confirmTxKey.info_2: 要在您的SSP密钥上确认交易，请在手机上打开SSP密钥并确认操作.您可以点击刷新或手动输入.

confirmPublicNoncesKey.confirm_public_nonces_key: 在SSP密钥上确认公共随机数
confirmPublicNoncesKey.confirm_public_nonces_key_info: 为了发送EVM交易，我们首先需要从SSP密钥获取用于交易构建的公共随机数.
confirmPublicNoncesKey.confirm_public_nonces_key_info_2: 要在您的SSP密钥上确认公共随机数，请在手机上打开SSP密钥并确认操作.您可以点击刷新或扫描以下二维码
confirmPublicNoncesKey.manual_input: 改为手动输入公共随机数

navbar.remove_last_wallet_desc: 此操作将移除您最近生成的钱包。您可以随时生成相同的新钱包.
navbar.max_wallets: 42.生命、宇宙以及一切的终极问题答案。您已达到钱包的最大数量.

passwordConfirm.err_pc1: 代码PC 1：钱包数据丢失.请恢复您的钱包.
passwordConfirm.grant_access_info_2: 使用密码授予访问权限.

key.err_sync_fail: 同步失败.生成的地址不匹配。请手动重试，并重新检查SSP钱包和SSP密钥中是否构建了相同的地址。SSP钱包和SSP密钥必须使用唯一的不同种子短语.
key.warn_await_sync: 正在等待SSP密钥同步或手动输入
key.err_sync_1: 请输入SSP密钥XPUB.SSP密钥XPUB与SSP钱包XPUB不同。请确保SSP钱包和SSP密钥都使用唯一的不同种子短语.
key.sync_info_content: 没有SSP密钥，SSP钱包无法使用.这将使您退出SSP钱包.
key.sync_info_1: SSP钱包是一个双签名钱包.您需要在移动设备上下载SSP密钥以访问您的钱包.
key.sync_info_2: Scan the following QR code using your 2FA SSP Key mobile app to synchronise your SSP Wallet with your SSP Key.
key.input_xpub: 在此输入SSP密钥{{chain}}扩展公钥{{path}}
key.warn_await_sync_chain: 正在等待SSP密钥同步或手动输入
key.err_sync_1_chain: 请输入{{chain}}链的SSP密钥XPUB。SSP密钥XPUB与SSP钱包XPUB不同.
key.sync_info_content_chain: 没有SSP密钥，{{chain}}链的SSP钱包无法使用。这将切换回比特币链
key.sync_info_2_chain: 扫描以下二维码，将{{chain}}链的SSP钱包与SSP密钥同步
key.ssp_key_download_here: Don't have SSP Key? Click here to download!
key.ssp_key_2fa: SSP Key is a 2FA for your SSP Wallet
key.ssp_key_download: Download and synchronize your SSP Key with your SSP Wallet using scanning the QR code below using your Camera or QR code reader.
key.ssp_key_download_2: SSP Key has it's own SSP Key recovery seed phrase. This is a different seed phrase than your SSP Wallet.
key.ssp_key_download_3: Once you have downloaded SSP Key, click on "Synchronise Key!" to continue with the SSP Key setup.

signMessage.sign_message_sspwid: 使用您的SSP钱包身份签署消息：
signMessage.sign_message_info: 使用您的{{chainName}}地址签署消息：

sspConnect.unsupported_contract: Unsupported contract. Import token contract first.

chainsInfo.chain_requests_info: A request to get information about all integrated chains in SSP was received. Following data of each chain will be shared: id, name, symbol, decimals and chainId. No personal data is shared.
chainsInfo.chain_requests_info_user: A request to get information about chains that your SSP Wallet has synchronised was received. Following data of each chain will be shared: id, name, symbol, decimals and chainId. While no personal data is shared, this request can be used to get information of what chains you are using.

tokensInfo.tokens_requests_info: A request to get information about tokens for {{chain}} chain was received. Following data of each token will be shared: contract, name, symbol, decimals. No personal data is shared.

addressesInfo.addresses_requests_info: A request to get the list of addresses for {{chain}} chain was received. This request will share your selected addresses. Excersice caution as your addresses will be shared with the requester.
addressesInfo.addresses_requests_info_all: A request to get a list of addresses for all synchronised blockchains was received. This request will share your selected addresses as well as chain information such as id, name, symbol, decimals and chainId. Excersice caution as your addresses will be shared with the requester.
addressesInfo.no_addresses: Chain not synchronised. No addresses found.

fusion.pa_info: 并行资产(PA)是Flux在多个区块链上的额外资产.您可以在此通过Fusion桥领取并行资产奖励.Fusion将自动领取您的PA奖励，将其转换为Flux并发送到您的Flux钱包.
fusion.total_to_claim: 可领取的并行资产总额：{{amount}} {{symbol}}
fusion.fusion_maintenance: Fusion正在维护中，请稍后重试.
fusion.signature_error: 签署Fusion请求时出错，请稍后重试.

contacts.err_saving_contacts: 保存联系人时出错，请重试。

tokens.remove_token_info: 此操作将从您的钱包中隐藏该代币.您可以随时将其添加回来.
tokens.unable_to_fetch_metadata: 无法获取代币元数据，请稍后重试.
tokens.err_delete_token: 删除代币时出错，请重试.

buy_sell_crypto.consent_info: The purchase and sale of cryptocurrencies are facilitated through a third-party service provided by Onramper. While SSP is committed to ensuring the highest level of security for its users, we cannot guarantee the security and privacy of third-party services.
buy_sell_crypto.consent_info_2: I acknowledge the associated risks and wish to proceed.
buy_sell_crypto.not_available_later: Cryptocurrency transactions are currently unavailable. Please try again later.

swap.estimated_amount: Due to the volatile nature of the cryptocurrency market, you may receive more or fewer coins than initially expected.
swap.floating_rate_fluctuates: The actual market rate at which a trade transaction is executed might differ from the rate shown at the time your trading order was submitted. This means that the final value of your trade could be different than initially indicated.
swap.fixed_rate_stable: The actual market rate at which a trade transaction is executed will be the same as the rate shown at the time your trading order was submitted. This means that the final value of your trade will be the same as initially indicated.
swap.rate_changed: Rate has changed, please review your amount.
swap.error_creating_swap: Error creating swap. Rate might have changed, please review your amount and try again.
swap.error_fetching_swap_history: Error fetching swap history. Please try again.

walletconnect.title: WalletConnect
walletconnect.connect_description: Connect to Web3 dApps by pasting WalletConnect URI from the dApp
walletconnect.confirm_disconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect this session?
walletconnect.enter_uri: Please enter a valid WalletConnect URI
walletconnect.dapp_requests_signature: The dApp is requesting you to sign a message.
walletconnect.ssp_key_confirmation_needed: This action requires confirmation on your SSP Key mobile device.
walletconnect.dapp_requests_typed_data_signature: The dApp is requesting you to sign typed data.
walletconnect.dapp_requests_transaction: The dApp is requesting you to send a transaction.
walletconnect.need_public_nonces: Public nonces are required for EVM transactions. Please confirm on your SSP Key.
walletconnect.dapp_requests_chain_switch: The dApp is requesting to switch to a different chain.
walletconnect.switch_chain_warning: Switching chains will change your active addresses. Each chain has unique addresses in SSP Wallet.
walletconnect.chain_unique_addresses_desc: SSP Wallet generates different addresses for each blockchain network to ensure security. Using an address on the wrong blockchain may result in permanent loss of funds.
walletconnect.address_loss_warning: Important: This address is for {{chainName}} network only
walletconnect.sign_only_not_implemented: Transaction signing without broadcasting is not yet implemented
walletconnect.chain_not_supported: Chain {{chainName}} is not supported by SSP Wallet
walletconnect.dapp_wants_to_connect: A dApp wants to connect to your wallet
walletconnect.connection_warning: Only connect to dApps you trust. Connections can view your account balance and request transaction approvals. Interacting with malicious dApps may result in permanent loss of funds. Always verify the dApp's authenticity before connecting.
walletconnect.required_chains_warning: Please select all chains required by the dApp and at least one account for each selected chain.
walletconnect.unsupported_chains_warning: Some requested chains are not supported
walletconnect.unsynced_chains_warning: Some supported chains need to be synced first
walletconnect.no_compatible_chains_desc: This dApp requires chains that are either not supported or not synced with your SSP Wallet. Please sync the required chains first.
walletconnect.required_explanation: Required by this dApp - you must select these chains to connect
walletconnect.navigation_not_available: Please go to Send EVM page and try again. Navigation not available from current page.
walletconnect.step_1_approve_wallet: Step 1: Approve on SSP Wallet to proceed with signing
walletconnect.step_1_approve_wallet_info: Step 1: Approve on SSP Wallet. After this, approval on your SSP Key is required.
walletconnect.chain_not_synced: {{chainName}} is not synced with your SSP Key
walletconnect.chain_sync_required: Please sync {{chainName}} with your SSP Key before switching to this network
walletconnect.addressDeployed: Address is deployed and ready for use
walletconnect.addressNotDeployed: Address not deployed - limited functionality with dApps
walletconnect.account_abstraction_deployment_desc: Smart contract addresses require deployment (first transaction) for EIP-1271 signature verification. Non-deployed addresses may have limited dApp compatibility.
walletconnect.defaulting_to_ethereum_desc: This dApp didn't specify any chains or requested an invalid chain (Chain ID 0). We're defaulting to Ethereum (Chain ID 1) to ensure proper functionality.
walletconnect.chain_compatibility_desc_1: You are currently on {{chainName}} (non-EVM chain), but this dApp requires EVM blockchain functionality.
walletconnect.chain_compatibility_desc_2: When you approve signing requests, we will share your Ethereum addresses instead. You can switch to an EVM chain anytime in your wallet.
walletconnect.address_not_found_current_chain: Address not found in current chain. Chain switch should have been performed before signing.
walletconnect.address_not_found_transaction: Address not found in current chain. Chain switch should have been performed before transaction.
walletconnect.navigation_failed: Unable to navigate to transaction screen
walletconnect.signing_chain_switch_desc: This signing request will switch to {{chainName}} chain.
walletconnect.address_different_chain: The address exists on a different chain than currently active.
walletconnect.eth_sign_transaction_not_supported: eth_signTransaction is not supported by Account Abstraction wallets. Please use eth_sendTransaction instead.
walletconnect.eth_sign_transaction_error: eth_signTransaction is not supported by Account Abstraction wallets. Account Abstraction wallets use UserOperations instead of traditional transactions. Please use eth_sendTransaction to execute the transaction directly.

walletconnect_tx_modal.erc20_transfer_warning: This will transfer tokens. Amount and recipient are encoded in the data.
walletconnect_tx_modal.erc20_transfer_from_warning: This will transfer tokens from another address.
walletconnect_tx_modal.erc20_approve_warning: This will approve token spending. Check the amount carefully.
walletconnect_tx_modal.nft_approval_warning: This will approve all your NFTs for trading. Use with caution.
walletconnect_tx_modal.unknown_function_warning: This is an unknown contract function. Verify carefully before proceeding.
walletconnect_tx_modal.chain_switch_desc: This transaction will switch to {{chainName}} chain.
walletconnect_tx_modal.address_different_chain: The address exists on a different chain than currently active.

tutorial.wallet_synchronized_desc: Your SSP Wallet is now ready! Would you like a quick tour to learn about all the features?
tutorial.click_highlighted: Click the highlighted element to continue
tutorial.tutorial_reset_success: Tutorial has been reset. You can start it again from the help button.
tutorial.switch_to_bitcoin_first: Please switch to Bitcoin blockchain first to start the tutorial. Use the chain selector at the top of the page.
tutorial.err_tutorial_wallet_data: Cannot start tutorial - wallet data not available. Please try again.
tutorial.navigating_to_home: Navigating to home page to start tutorial...
tutorial.waiting_wallet_data: Waiting for wallet data to load...
tutorial.tutorial_cancelled: Tutorial cancelled. You can restart it anytime using the help button.
tutorial.tutorial_cancelled_wrong_chain: Tutorial cancelled: You selected a different chain. The tutorial requires Ethereum to continue. You can restart it from the menu.

welcome_overview.title: Welcome to SSP Wallet!
welcome_overview.content: You've successfully synced SSP Wallet with SSP Key and connected to the Bitcoin blockchain! Your wallet is now ready to use. Here you can see your wallet address and balance. Always verify that the wallet address displayed here matches the address shown on your SSP Key device.

multi_chain_intro.title: Multiple Blockchain Support
multi_chain_intro.content: SSP Wallet supports multiple blockchains! This dropdown shows your current wallet and chain. Click on it to access chain switching options.

find_switch_chain.title: Switch Chain Button
find_switch_chain.content: Perfect! Now click on "Switch Chain" to open the blockchain selection where you can choose different networks.

select_ethereum.title: Select Ethereum
select_ethereum.content: Great! The chain selection modal is open. Now click on Ethereum to switch to the Ethereum blockchain. This will trigger synchronization with the Ethereum network.

ethereum_sync_waiting.title: Sync with SSP Key
ethereum_sync_waiting.content: To begin synchronizing with the Ethereum blockchain, scan the QR code with your SSP Key. This will enable your wallet to interact with Ethereum, its tokens and dApps.
ethereum_sync_waiting.sync_hint: The tutorial will continue automatically once sync is complete.

ethereum_tokens.title: Welcome to Ethereum!
ethereum_tokens.content: You're now on Ethereum! This chain supports smart contracts and ERC-20 tokens. The Tokens section lets you manage your token portfolio - view, add, or search for popular tokens like USDT and USDC.

add_token_demo.title: Adding Tokens
add_token_demo.content: Click here to add new tokens. You can search for popular tokens like USDT or add custom tokens by entering their contract address.

receive_intro.title: Receiving Funds
receive_intro.content: Click Receive to get your Ethereum address. This address can receive ETH and any ERC-20 tokens. You can copy the address or use the QR code.

send_intro.title: Sending Funds
send_intro.content: The Send button opens the transaction interface where you can send cryptocurrency to other addresses. It includes fields for recipient, amount, and fees.

swap_feature.title: Swap Feature
swap_feature.content: Exchange one cryptocurrency for another instantly. Swap between different tokens or convert ETH to tokens.

buy_sell_feature.title: Buy & Sell Crypto
buy_sell_feature.content: Purchase cryptocurrency with fiat currency or sell your crypto for cash. This integrates with trusted payment providers.

activity_section.title: Transaction History
activity_section.content: The Activity section shows your complete transaction history. View sent, received, and pending transactions with full details.

activity_explanation.title: Your Transactions
activity_explanation.content: Here you can see all your transactions - incoming, outgoing, and pending. Click any transaction for detailed information including fees and confirmations.

contacts_section.title: Contacts Management
contacts_section.content: The Contacts section lets you save frequently used addresses with custom names. This makes sending funds easier and safer.

contacts_explanation.title: Your Address Book
contacts_explanation.content: Save addresses you send to frequently. Each contact has a name and address, making transactions more convenient and reducing errors.

extended_menu_intro.title: Advanced Menu Features
extended_menu_intro.content: This menu provides access to advanced features: WalletConnect for connecting to dApps, Address Details, SSP Wallet Details, Settings and more. The lock icon on the right securely logs you out.

address_management.title: Wallets Management
address_management.content: This dropdown manages multiple addresses per blockchain. You can create new addresses, switch between existing ones, or remove the last created address. Each address is independent with its own balance and transaction history.

tutorial_complete.title: Tutorial Complete!
tutorial_complete.content: Congratulations! You now know how to use all major features of SSP Wallet. Explore confidently and manage your crypto securely.
